title: Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia       Explore Jean Lafitte with videos and animations!  Check out Investigators in Action to follow researchers as they learn more about the park and the world. Watch the Delta Dynamics animations: meet the mighty Mississippi River, discover how rivers build wetlands, and find out why Louisiana's coast is disappearing.  Watch our National Park Week video from April 2012 and picture yourself visiting Jean Lafitte National Historic Park and Preserve!  Â                      Picture Yourself at Jean Lafitte NHPP Some classic moments promoting National Park Week in 2012.  Duration:38 seconds
